description: Structured lessons from Chiranjeevi filmography manual review for reuse on any actor.

hero_to_villain.pattern: Actor in hero but played antagonist
hero_to_villain.action: Clear hero; add to supporting_cast with type 'villain', optional role/character

supporting_to_hero.pattern: Actor in supporting_cast but was lead/anti-hero
supporting_to_hero.action: Set hero = Actor; remove from supporting_cast

hero_to_supporting.pattern: Bilingual: hero in one language, supporting in another
hero_to_supporting.action: Clear hero; add to supporting_cast with type 'supporting'

supporting_to_cameo.action: Update supporting_cast entry type to 'cameo', optional role e.g. 'Himself', 'Lord Shiva'

not_in_filmography.pattern: Film title similar to real one but not in actor's filmography
not_in_filmography.action: Remove actor from hero and supporting_cast; set hero to correct lead

transliteration_variants.action: Keep one row (preferred title); delete the other movie row
examples: Bruce Lee / Bruce Lee: The Fighter

cameo.pattern: Film exists; actor had cameo not in DB
cameo.action: Add to supporting_cast with type 'cameo', role e.g. 'Himself'

villain.pattern: Film exists (e.g. other language); actor was antagonist
villain.action: Add to supporting_cast with type 'villain'; ensure is_published true
